document.full_text: pakistan has agreed to allow a visit by indian investigators as part of their probe into the 2008 mumbai militant attacks in a significant confidence building measure between the nuclear-armed neighbors.
document.title: indian investigators to visit pakistan in mumbai probe
lines_and_colors: pakistan has agreed to allow a visit by indian investigators as part of their probe into the 2008 mumbai militant attacks in a significant confidence building measure between the nuclear-armed neighbors.
